sentences.english: You will always recognize concealed emotions.
sentences.chinese: 你將永遠能夠辨識掩藏的情緒。

sentences.english: Medium parameters reflecting the loose body properties are determined by using the parameter recognition method.
sentences.chinese: 利用參數辨識方法求出了反映散體性質的介質參數。

sentences.english: Sometimes a simple-looking object at night can be easily misidentified .
sentences.chinese: 有時一個簡單看的對象在晚上可能容易地被錯誤辨識。

sentences.english: This suggests the ability to recognize faces is heritable.
sentences.chinese: 這說明面孔辨識能力是可遺傳的。

sentences.english: Our galaxy's core is a frenzied place, and identifying baby stars there has been difficult.
sentences.chinese: 銀心是一個混亂的區域，從中辨識出早期恆星很難。

sentences.english: This paper sums up the lattice identification algorithms of ARMA model, which are developed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 本文總結了近年來發展的ARMA模型格形辨識算法。

sentences.english: The speed estimation is core question of the speed sensorless direct torque control system.
sentences.chinese: 速度辨識是無速度傳感器直接轉矩控制的核心問題。

sentences.english: Three papular approaches to IM speed identification are compared in simulation.
sentences.chinese: 分析比較了當前主要的三種異步電機速度辨識方法。

sentences.english: Them-sequence are widely used to identify the impulse response function of a system.
sentences.chinese: m系列廣泛應用於系統脈衝響應函數的辨識。

sentences.english: Stay with the sensation of infinite space that comes along with the perception.
sentences.chinese: 定在隨著那個辨識而來的無限空間感中。

sentences.english: Would you say he's the most recognizable celebrity out of the group?
sentences.chinese: 你們認爲他是你們之中辨識度最高的名人嗎？
明度水平影響辨識的效應。

sentences.english: With the coefficients' characteristic relations, the number of coefficients to be identified could be reduced greatly.
sentences.chinese: 利用係數的特徵關係，能使需要辨識的參數個數減少。

sentences.english: Put forward an on-line adoption parameter tracing identification method using GA aiming at the time-varying structure.
sentences.chinese: 提出時變結構的GA在線自適應參數跟蹤辨識方法。

sentences.english: As far as system identification is concerned, the back-propagation network is used in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用了反向傳播網絡進行系統辨識。

sentences.english: They even confuse the nature of Yin and Yang of this kind of essence, taking Yin for Yang.
sentences.chinese: 甚至很容易混淆這種質性的陰陽本質，將陰辨識爲陽。

definition: to differentiate/to draw a distinction/to divide into categories
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
direct observation/directly perceived through the senses/intuitive/audiovisual
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
to restore to the original state/to reconstruct (an event)/reduction (chemistry)
